creatures.name: Arcane Fox (Kitsunari)
creatures.description: A fox with two tails and fur that shifts like a mirage. Mildly telepathic and capable of minor illusions.
creatures.habitat: Ley Line verges, magical groves, enchanted forests
creatures.behavior: Curious, playful trickster, protective of magical areas, avoids direct confrontation
creatures.diet: Omnivorous - berries, small animals, magical energy from ley lines
creatures.abilities: Telepathic communication, minor illusion spells, short-range phase shifting, can sense magic
creatures.weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold iron, dislikes loud noises, cannot phase through consecrated ground
creatures.loot: Arcane Fox Tail Feather (rare alchemical ingredient), Kitsunari Pelt (magical component)
